verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
D
Reign in me
Sov'reign Lord, reign in me
Reign in me
Sov'reign Lord, reign in me

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Captivate my heart
Let Your kingdom come
Establish there Your throne
Let Your will be done

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Reign in me
Sov'reign Lord, reign in me
Reign in me
Sov'reign Lord, reign in me
